wlan: Complies with IEEE 802.11b/g/n standard (standard WLAN protocol),       channel 1-11, encryption method
label36: Leica T app for iOS (remote control and image transfer, free download           from Apple App-Store)
powersupply: Leica BP-DC 13 lithium ion battery, rated voltage 7.4       V, capacity 1040 mAh (based on CIPA standard); approx. 400 pictures, charging       time (after total discharge); approx. 160 min
connections: Micro USB port (2.0 High Speed), Leica flash interface       with integrated connection for optional accessories; battery charging via       USB connection with possible with max. 1A
monitor: 3.7' TFT LCD, 1.3 million pixels, 854 x 480 per color channel
body: Leica unibody solid aluminum design, two removable dummy plugs       for carrying strap and other accessories, ISO flash shoe with center and control       contacts for connection of more powerful external flash units, e.g. Leica       SF 26 or for attaching the Leica Visoflex electronic viewfinder
label35: Adobe Photoshp Lightroom (free download after registration of camera)
sensor: CMOS sensor, size APS-C (23.6 x 15.7 mm) with 16.5/16.3 million       pixels (total/effective), format aspect ratio 3
flashmodes: Automatic, automatic / red eye reduction, always on,       always on / red eye reduction, slow sync, slow sync / red eye reduction
exposuremodes: Automatic program, aperture priority, shutter speed       priority, manual setting, scene exposure modes
whitebalance: Automatic, presets for daylight, cloud, halogen lighting,      shadow, electronic flash, two manual settings, manual color temperature setting
software: Adobe Photoshp Lightroom (free download after registration of camera) Leica T app for iOS (remote control and image transfer, free download           from Apple App-Store)
